column1: lenor francisco cooper| lenor francisco cooper 02/21/1935 ~ 06/19/2015. lenor francisco cooper passed away friday at wake medical center in raleigh
column2: nc. she was preceded in death by her parents basil and margaret francisco and daughter patricia f. tilley. she is survived by sons; timothy cooper and wife joan and rick cooper and wife wanda both of clayton; daughters
column3: deborah jones and husband eddie of vinton
column4: va. and pamela sutterfield and husband george of raleigh; son-in-law boone tilley; grandchildren
column9: richard cooper and wife ashton and jordon cooper. she also has 8 great-grandchildren. special friends dr. ghulam shaikh and wife maryia and 3- sons
column10: carolyn and eugene andrews and nat partlo. lenor was an active member or mount moriah baptist church where she worked with the gas for 20 years
column11: served on altar and decorations committee and taught sunday school. she was a member of the clayton home demonstration club where she held the office of president for a number of years. she won several awards at the county and state levels for her sewing. she held several different offices while serving with the raleigh womens bowling association. she won several bowling awards and the sportmanship award. she also loved gardening and flower arranging. visitation will be held on monday from 6:00 8:00 pm at bryan-lee funeral home
column12: garner. funeral will be held at 2:00 pm tuesday at mount moriah baptist church.. burial will be in the church cemetery. in lieu of flowers
column13: donations may be made to the mount moriah baptist church audio fund. visitation06/22/20156:00 - 8:00 pmbryan-lee funeral home
